fields.label: Project impacts on marine and coastal health supporting documents
fields.description: Visual and analytical materials demonstrating project effects, such as environmental assessments, biodiversity surveys, aerial imagery, and satellite data

fields.name: oceanFloorConditional
fields.label: Ocean floor substrate coverage has changed as result of project activities
fields.description: Indicates whether ocean floor substrate has changed due to project activities (i.e., density of seagrass meadows, coral cover, etc)

fields.name: oceanFloorDetails
fields.label: Overview of changes to ocean floor substrate cover
fields.description: Changes in ocean floor substrate coverage (i.e., increase in seagrass or coral cover) due to project activities

fields.name: oceanFloorUpload
fields.label: Ocean floor substrate coverage supporting documents
fields.description: Documents supporting any reported changes to ocean floor substrate coverage

fields.name: noisePlan
fields.label: Noise pollution mitigation plan in place
fields.description: The World Health Organization (WHO) defines noise above 65 decibels (dB) as noise pollution. Indicates whether there is a plan in place to mitigate project noise levels over this level.

fields.name: noisePlanEvidence
fields.label: Noise mitigation plan documentation
fields.description: Documentation of noise mitigation plans

fields.name: noiseBaseline
fields.label: Baseline noise level survey has been conducted
fields.description: Noise pollution testing involves measuring sound levels using a sound level meter to determine if they exceed acceptable limits. The results are often compared to regulations or standards to ensure compliance.

fields.name: noiseBaselineDay
fields.label: Baseline average daytime noise levels (decibels)
fields.description: Average daytime noise level in decibles before project operations

fields.name: noiseBaselineNight
fields.label: Baseline average nighttime noise levels in decibels
fields.description: Average night-time noise level in decibles before project operations

fields.name: noiseImpact
fields.label: Project activities contribute to increased noise pollution
fields.description: Project activities (such as the sound of construction or operation) contribute to increased noise pollution

fields.name: noiseDistance
fields.label: Distance of project location from nearest human residents
fields.description: Distance of project from nearest non-project community settlement (with indication of meters, miles, kilometres, etc)

fields.name: noiseDistanceEvidence
fields.label: Evidence of proximity to nearest human residents
fields.description: Documentation of the proximity of the project activity to the nearest human populations

fields.name: noiseProjectDay
fields.label: Average daytime noise levels after project completion in decibels
fields.description: Average daytime noise level in decibles post project initiation

fields.name: noiseProjectNight
fields.label: Average nighttime noise levels after project completion in decibels
fields.description: Average night-time noise level in decibles during project operations

fields.name: noiseImpactEvidence
fields.label: Noise pollution impacts supporting documents
fields.description: Documents such as sound level readings from baseline conditions as well as project conditions

fields.name: infrastructureAccess
fields.label: The structures or roads are publicly available and accessible to all community members
fields.description: Indicates whether the roads or infrastructure used for the project are public   and/or whether the community has limited accessibility to the infrastructure

fields.name: infrastructureEvidence
fields.label: Project infrastructure development plans and supporting documents
fields.description: Documentation such as building plans, timelines, or blueprints of construction needed for project operations

fields.name: infrastructureDetails
fields.label: Summary of constructed structures, roads, and access management
fields.description: Overview of any infrastructure that has been built specifically as part of the project activity

fields.name: infrastructureConditional
fields.label: Project has resulted in new construction of roads, buildings, or other structures within project boundaries
fields.description: Indicates whether buildings, roads, or infrastructure such as irrigation systems have been built for project operations

fields.name: infrastructureOtherImpacts
fields.label: Other ecological impacts of infrastructure development and mitigation activities
fields.description: Other than noise pollution and habitat fragmentation, any consequential environmental impacts due to infrastructure or building construction

fields.name: infrastructureSpecies
fields.label: Species affected by development and any remediation measures taken by project
fields.description: Overview of the species affected by the project activity and any plans, actions, or initiatives taken to limit impact (i.e., fish bridges, wildlife corridors, etc.)

fields.name: infrastructureHabitatImpacts
fields.label: Infrastructure development has contributed to habitat fragmentation for monitored species
fields.description: Indicates whether buildings, roads, or infrastructure contribute to habitat fragmentation (i.e., inhibit the ability of species to move freely within their habitats)

fields.label: First key differentiator title

fields.name: kd1Details
fields.label: Details about the first differentiator

fields.name: kd3Details

fields.name: kd4Details

fields.name: kd4Media
fields.label: Key differentiator image or video

fields.name: sdgTable1
fields.label: Sustainable development goal overview

columns.name: sdg
columns.label: Sustainable development goals (SDGs)
options: SDG 8: Decent work and economic growth
SDG 16: Peace, justice, and strong institutions
columns.description: The SDGs supported by the project

fields.name: sdgUpload
fields.label: SDG documentation

fields.name: sdgVerification
fields.label: SDG claims have been third party verified

fields.name: sdgVerificationBody
fields.label: SDG verification body
